resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Compliance Assessment of specialized Nutriious Food(SNF)-[For Arm 4 and 5]
Was the child available for interview?
Have You received Snf/Wavamum for your child during last month?(show sachets of Wavamum)
If refused,what was/were the reason for refusal?
From whom did you receive Wavamum
How many sachets of wawamum have you received for your child during the last one month(30days)?
How many sachets does your child use per day?
Enter (00) if Not using/stopped to use
If not using or stopped to use,what was/were the reasons for not using/stopped to use?
How many days and sachets of Wawamum did your child use during the last one month (30 days)?
Can you please show me a used and an un-used packet of Wawamum available with you? (Put 00 if not available)
Did you notice any side effect(s) of Wawamum during the last one month (30 days)?
If yes, what was/were the side effects?
Did you share Wawamum of (NAME) with others during the last one month (30 days)?
If yes, who are you shared with?
How many sachets were shared during last one month (30 days)?
What were the reasons for sharing of Wawamum with others?
I believe it is beneficial for other children/adults as well
Did you or any family member of your household receive BISP cash during the last month (30 days)?
If yes, how much amount did you receive during the last month (30 days)?
If no, when did you receive last cash from BISP?
Where do you spend this (BISP) money?
Have you received any health education or messages during last month (30 days)?
If yes, what was/were those messages on?
Not sharing of Wawamum with others
What was the source of health education or message(s)?
Mass media (radio, television, print material, internet)
Did the child (NAME) have any of the following illnesses during the last month (30 days)?[PROMT FOR EACH AND RECORD]Any other health complications?
Did you seek any care for these illnesses during the last month (30 days)?
Who did you see for the illness (s) in the last month (30 days)?Anyone else? [PROBE TO IDENTIFY EACH TYPE OF PERSON AND RECORD ALL MENTIONED]
Was (NAME) breastfed yesterday during the day or at night?
Did (NAME) consume breast milk in any of these ways yesterday during the day or at night?

NOTE: Sometimes babies are fed breast milk in different ways, for example by spoon, cup or bottle. This can happen when the mother cannot always be with her baby. Sometimes babies are breastfed by another woman, or given breast milk from another woman by spoon, cup or bottle or some other way. This can happen if a mother cannot breastfeed her own baby.
Now I would like to ask you about some medicines and vitamins that are sometimes given to infants.Was (NAME) given any vitamin drops or other medicines as drops yesterday during the day or at night?
Was (NAME) given [ORS/ NIMKOL] yesterday during the day or at night?

Next I would like to ask you about some liquids that (NAME) may have consumed yesterday during the day or at night.Did (NAME) have any (ITEM FROM LIST)?Read the list of liquids starting with ‘plain water’.
Milk such as tinned, powdered, or fresh animal milk?
Any other liquids such as [Grip Water, Tea, Rice water]?
How many times yesterday during the day or at night did (NAME) consume any (ITEM FROM LIST)?

a) Think about when (NAME) first woke up yesterday. Did (NAME) eat anything at that time? \n b) What did (NAME) do after that? Did (NAME) eat anything at that time? \n c) What ingredients were in that (MIXED DISH)? Probe: Anything else?
Porridge, bread, rice, noodles, or other foods made from grains
Pumpkin, carrots, squash, or sweet potatoes that are yellow or orange inside
White potatoes, white yams, manioc, cassava, or any other foods made from roots
Ripe mangoes, ripe papayas, or (insert other local vitamin A-rich fruits)
Liver, kidney, heart, or other organ meats
Any meat, such as beef, lamb, goat, chicken, or duck
Fresh or dried fish, shellfish, or seafood
Any foods made from beans, peas, lentils, nuts, or seeds
Cheese, yogurt, or other milk products
Any oil, fats, or butter, or foods made with any of these
Any sugary foods such as chocolates, sweets, candies, pastries, cakes, or biscuits
Condiments for flavour, such as chilies, spices, herbs, or fish powder
Foods made with red palm oil, red palm nut, or red palm nut pulp sauce
Did (NAME) eat any solid, semi-solid, or soft foods yesterday during the day or at night?IF ‘YES’ PROBE: What kind of solid, semi-solid, or soft foods did (NAME) eat?
How many times did (NAME) eat solid, semi-solid, or soft foods other than liquids yesterday during the day or at night?
Did (NAME) drink anything from a bottle with a nipple yesterday during the day or night?
Yesterday, during the day or night, did (NAME) consume any [list iron fortified solid, semi-solid or soft foods designed specifically for infants and young children available in the local setting]?

Yesterday, during the day or night, did (NAME) consume any food to which you added a [powder or sprinkles, vitamixi] like this?Show common types of micronutrient powders/vitamixi available in survey area.
Yesterday, during the day or night, did (NAME) consume any [list lipid-based nutrient supplement (LNS) Wawamum available in the local setting]? Show Wawamum sachet available in survey area.
Yesterday, during the day or night, did (NAME) consume any [list iron fortified infant/toddler formulas available in the local setting]?
